query:
SELECT 
  tc.id as inspection_id,
  tc.templateId,
  ct.name as template_name,
  COUNT(cti.id) as template_items_count
FROM taskChecklists tc
LEFT JOIN checklistTemplates ct ON tc.templateId = ct.id
LEFT JOIN checklistTemplateItems cti ON cti.templateId = ct.id
WHERE tc.id = 30001
GROUP BY tc.id, tc.templateId, ct.name;
